name: Aquaman Costume
shortDescription: Medium Costume for DC universe Aquaman
longDescription: This is a great way to look like Aquaman. This is a Skin tight suit, one piece, with zipper in the back. It is of great quality and stretches to conform to wearer.

rating.comment: This fits great, although is tight along the midrif.

name: Batman Costume
shortDescription: Large Costume for DC universe Batman
longDescription: Batman is here! This is a legit Batman costume with real leather. It will  come with everything you need fight bad guys as the dark knight.

rating.comment: Fought many bad guys, would buy again

name: The Flash Costume
shortDescription: Medium Costume for DC universe the Flash
longDescription: This is a great way to look like the Flash. This is a Skin tight suit, one piece, with zipper in the back. It is of great quality and stretches to conform to wearer.

rating.comment: They can't catch me when I put this on!

name: Wonder Woman
shortDescription: Wonder woman costume for woman - Size Small
longDescription: Fight bad guys, teach those men not underestimate a woman. All woman are wonder woman when wearing this costume!

rating.comment: BECAUSE I AM STRONGER THAN YESTERDAY!
They can't catch me when I put this on!
